sellerCard.description: Amith Fernando, a seasoned professional wordpress web developer with a strong background in design. With my expertise, I ensure precise and successful project completion. Let's collaborate to achieve your goals

description.content:
Looking for a modern and professional website? You've come to the right place!

Let's bring your vision to life with a stunning wordress website.


wordpress websites I create:


- Business

- E-commerce

- Blogs/News

- Portfolio

- Landing Pages

- Forums


Additional services:


Stunning layouts and easy customization

Convert designs into functional wordpress website.

Add cool animation effects for a better user experience.

Expert wordpress plugin and theme customization.

Custom Image Designing

Ensuring optimized speed and security for your wordpress website


Let's make something great together. Get in touch now to begin your online journey!


Portfolio:


Behance - www.behance.net/amithfernando2

LinkedIn - www.linkedin.com/in/amith-fernando


Save this wordpress gig for later by clicking "Save."


For custom projects, contact me for tailored offers.


Check my profile for more services and satisfied clients!


Amith Fernando

Thank you!

questionsAndAnswers.question: Got Any Question?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Send a message for free consultant.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you help me migrate my current website to WordPress?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Absolutely! I offer website migration services to help you seamlessly transfer your current website to the WordPress platform without losing any data.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you add additional features or functionalities to my WordPress website later on?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Certainly! I can help you expand your website's capabilities by adding new features or integrating plugins as per your evolving requirements.

packageList.title: Basic Website
packageList.description:
Basic Wordpress Website Up to 3 Pages,
Branded, Responsive Layout

packageList.title: Standard Website
packageList.description:
Modern Wordpress Website Up to 5 Pages,
SPEED+SEO+SECURITY

packageList.title: ENTERPRISE
packageList.description: Ecommerce functionality. SPEED+SEO+SECURITY optimization. SSL and Custom Design Images.

openGraph.title: develop modern wordpress website

reviews.comment: Very well done job, after a small disagreement Fernando mediated in a very professional way and, in the end, we got back on the same page to continue to achieve the final goal. I highly recommend working with Fernando and entrusting him with your projects. He will have the patience to listen and give you valuable advice on how to best develop your ideas. Our website was really well thought out and well structured by Fernando's experience and suggestions. Well done Fernando, really great work, I'm happy to have collaborated with you and I hope to do so in the near future.

he did an excellent job designing our website. They delivered high-quality work on time and were extremely responsive throughout the process. Their attention to detail and willingness to accommodate our needs made the entire experience smooth and efficient. Highly recommended!

seller_response.comment: Thank you again for trust me with all of your projects ❤ glad to work with you .

reviews.comment: He was great to work with. quick to understand and went above and beyond to complete the project
he was responsive and went above and beyond
